content.query:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'https://modineerlake.blob.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/GLOVIA_PROD/JE_DET/NotProcessed/*.parquet',
                FORMAT = 'PARQUET') AS ROWS

SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://modineerlake.blob.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/GLOVIA_PROD/JE_DET/Processed/',
    FORMAT = 'delta') as rows;
